EmailTemplate.subject: Control VMware, Openstack, UCS, Citrix, EMC, Hyper V, & More | The Only Unified Control Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Heterogeneous Control? Yes We Do. Learn More <http://bit.ly/1mV7kov> Try VMTurbo <http://bit.ly/1mV7kov> Free for 30 Days & Control Every Vendor from a Single Pane of Glass Eliminate vendor lock, and complete control of your cloud with VMTurbo Operations Manager: the world's first unified control system for cloud and virtualized environments. VMTurbo continuously decides WHICH workloads should run WHERE and WHEN - in real time, within 1 hour of installation - to assure application performance while running operations in the most cost-effective way possible.
- Unify disparate vendors and future-proof your cloud - Assure application performance - including VDI seats - Minimize licensing costs through perfect rightsizing and placement - Onboard new hypervisors, storage, and hardware with ease - Burst to your cloud of choice as needed as efficiently as possible Get Free Download <http://bit.ly/1mV7kov> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
